ComicInfo.Title: Life At Double Shots part 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Sweets To The Sweet: A man gives a woman a box of chocolates, but only if she agrees to eat them naked.
Going Down On Memory Lane: Zig Zag begins watching old sex tapes of herself and the memories get her aroused.
The Reader's Poll Results: Readers suggest a partner to satisfy perpetually erect Mikey.
Where Else Can You Make Ten Bucks A Second?: The working girls at Piggy's find a way around servicing a bothersome repeat customer.
Life At Double Shots, Part 2: If Misty's new job wasn't humiliating enough, Jules brings his crude friend Lyle to the restaurant.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev110 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-28 18:28:12. [Issue ID 226555]
ComicInfo.Writer: Kurt Wilcken,Max Blackrabbit,Kjartan Arnórsson,T. Grimmer,Brian O'Connell,David Koppenhaver
ComicInfo.Penciller: Kurt Wilcken,Max Blackrabbit,Kjartan Arnórsson,T. Grimmer,David Koppenhaver
ComicInfo.Inker: Kurt Wilcken,Max Blackrabbit,Kjartan Arnórsson,T. Grimmer,David Koppenhaver
